author: wtopstaff
title: Martha Stewart by the numbers
text:
Home » News » Entertainment » Martha Stewart by the numbers Martha Stewart by the numbers By The Associated Press October 14, 2015 10:32 am 
NEW YORK (AP) — Lifestyle guru Martha Stewart turned a catering business into a media and home goods empire. Here are some key numbers and dates in her career: 
— 1997, the year Stewart founded Martha Stewart Living Omnimedia. 
— $1.8 billion, how much Martha Stewart Living Omnimedia was worth when the company first sold shares on Wall Street in 1999. 
— $353 million, the price Sequential Brands plans to pay in cash and stock for Martha Stewart Living Omnimedia Inc. 
— 85 books published by the company. 
— 200 recipes in the latest book, “Martha Stewart’s Appetizers.” 
— $3.50, the price of a small cappuccino at the Martha Stewart Cafe in New York. 
— Five flavors of Martha Stewart dog treats sold at PetSmart. 
— Two magazines the company produces, Martha Stewart Living and Martha Stewart Weddings. Topics:
